column1: # 1. Uncomment ONE strategy profile below (remove # from start of lines)
# 2. Comment out all other strategies (add # at start of lines)
# 3. Save file and run trader (NO RECOMPILING NEEDED!)
# - Signal Detection: When to enter trades
# - Timing Parameters: How frequently to check markets
# - Risk/Reward Ratios: Profit targets vs stop losses
# - atr_multiplier_entry: Higher = need more volatility to trade
# - volume_multiplier: Higher = need more volume to trade
# - risk_per_trade: % of equity to risk per trade
# - max_value_per_trade: Max $ amount per trade (0 = no limit)
# Risk Level: LOW | Signal Frequency: LOW | Hold Time: MEDIUM-LONG
# Risk Level: HIGH | Signal Frequency: VERY HIGH | Hold Time: VERY SHORT
# Risk Level: MEDIUM | Signal Frequency: MEDIUM | Hold Time: SHORT-MEDIUM
# Risk Level: LOW-MEDIUM | Signal Frequency: LOW | Hold Time: LONG
# Risk Level: MEDIUM | Signal Frequency: MEDIUM | Hold Time: MEDIUM
# Risk Level: MEDIUM | Signal Frequency: LOW | Hold Time: MEDIUM
# Risk Level: HIGH | Signal Frequency: EXTREME | Hold Time: SECONDS-MINUTES
# Risk Level: LOW | Signal Frequency: VERY LOW | Hold Time: DAYS-WEEKS
# Copy and modify this template to create your own custom strategy:
# Risk Level: [LOW/MEDIUM/HIGH] | Signal Frequency: [LOW/MEDIUM/HIGH] | Hold Time: [SHORT/MEDIUM/LONG]
